channel.title: A bug
channel.description:
Hey everytime someone logs out of my server they can't get back in. Also if I am not logged into the server, it gives a bunch of errors like this
[CODE] [client-3-bring it]: Invalid waypoint in walking queue! ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:52597 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:52598 [client-7-bring it]: Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. [client-7-hh3]: hh3 is already online. [/CODE]
then after everyone disconnects it will say random stuff like
[CODE]INDEX = 12 Npc id = 6[/CODE] randomly. Basically I want to know why my server keeps crashing when im not on and why when they log off they cannot get back in. Thanks. (cheezscape 80 source).[br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 05:23:23 PM[/size][hr]anyone help please?

item.title: A bug
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“KiIIer, post:1, topic:57825”]INDEX = 12 Npc id = 6
randomly. Basically I want to know why my server keeps crashing when im not on and why when they log off they cannot get back in. Thanks. (cheezscape 80 source).[br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 05:23:23 PM[/size][hr]anyone help please?[/quote]

umm those top two i just qouted are normal the Npc id = 6 means your attacking something

then when someone takes out to many items like 2000m then it will cause everyone to freeze up and not able to get in

Read full topic
